room_title: Escape room "The Midnight Train" by Escape Brigade in Chicago
review: Had a great experience here for my son's 10th birthday. The owner was super helpful and the kids had an awesome time.

room_title: Escape room "The Midnight Train" by Escape Brigade in Chicago
review: Super fun! It's a little hard to find, but if you're walking into an office building you got the right place. There are two rooms and both are very challenging and require a lot of thinking. Helpful employees as well as a nice waiting room.

room_title: Escape room "The Midnight Train" by Escape Brigade in Chicago
review: We did the Train scenario and liked it so much that we ended up staying and doing the Lab scenario. I would recommend this highly.
